title: black screen in champion selects
body:
hello, these days i've been encountering issues like a black screen on the champ select .
it stays there for a while like a good 15 seconds or 20 and then i am forced either into a role or into a 6 minutes ban for not choosing a champ{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  help please

replies.body:
There is currently an issue going on with the Beta Client that causes this type of behavior. Current workarounds that are being tested are either collapsing your friends list (not showing) before queueing for a match or using the Legacy Client for now. 

Please let me know if either workaround happened to work for you.
